title: Heavenly chocolate and hazelnut cheesecake
ingredients: ['500g chocolate chips, divided', '275g digestive or amaretti crumbs (or combo)', '55g toasted, ground hazelnuts', '2 tablespoons caster sugar', '3 tablespoons butter, melted', '675g cream cheese, softened', '200g caster sugar', '3 eggs, beaten', '3 tablespoons hazelnut liqueur', '13 skinned, toasted hazelnuts', '4 tablespoons soured cream', '1 tablespoon hazelnut liqueur']
